thread.title: ANOTHER E-BIKE ACCIDENT, ANOTHER DEATH

author: farhan
title: ANOTHER E-BIKE ACCIDENT, ANOTHER DEATH
text:
ANOTHER E-BIKE ACCIDENT, ANOTHER DEATH   
Dear A.S.S. Editor Advertisement 
Another day, another report of an accident between e-bike and car. This time, on Monday night, a 57 year old man died in hospital after the accident with a car at Hougang. The e-bike and car collided at the junction of Hougang Street 93 and Buangkok Green at 8.09pm. 
The man was taken unconscious to hospital, where he died later. Police still investigating. Another e-bike death. Should really just ban e-bike from the roads. No matter whether the e-bikers follow road rules or not, they accident with car, confirm only one winner. Just too many people dying needlessly on the roads. 
Just stay safe everyone! 
A.S.S. Contributor Editor's Note: 
If not, why not give us a 'Like' ? Filed Under:
